Dear Parents,
The Secondary Charity Committee will be holding a 'Bring and Buy a Book Sale' on Friday, 1st November at lunch time for Primary and Secondary students to be held in the Upper School Library. Students are encouraged to donate a book they have finished reading and buy a new one. There will be a minimum donation of 5 RMB for each book.
The money raised will be going to a charity called ‘Room to Read’ (www.roomtoread.org). The charity works to provide education to those in remote parts of the world. 'Room to Read’s programmes have benefitted more than 7.8 million children so far and we are on track to have helped 10 million under privileged children by 2015. Imagine a world in which every child has access to an education. ‘Room to Read’ is doing its best to make this dream a reality, one child at a time.
Parents and staff are also welcome to bring books in for the event, as well as purchasing donated books.
Thank you very much for your ongoing support to the school's Charity Committee.
Kindest regards.
Amanda Boby (Community Action and Fundraising Coordinator) & Emily Hardwick (Secondary English KS3 Lead Teacher).
The British School of Guangzhou
